messages.content: what is निवल मूल्य की अपेक्षाए?
निवल मूल्य की अपेक्षा किसी स्टॉक पर निर्धारित होती है जब उस स्टॉक के वास्तविक मूल्य और इसके फंड्स को लेकर प्रबंधक या निवेशकों के बीच सहमति बन जाती है।
what is निवल मूल्य की अपेक्षाए?

what is निवल मूल्य की अपेक्षाए in details with all points

The provided text details net worth expectations under the heading "निवल मूल्य की अपेक्षाएं" (Net Worth Expectations) in section 8.  Here's a breakdown of the points:

**(1) Entities seeking registration as an FME:** Must comply with the net worth requirements specified in Schedule II of these regulations or other criteria specified by the Authority.

**(2) Entities operating as a branch:** Must comply with the minimum net worth requirements for their operations in the IFSC, as specified in these regulations. This can be maintained at the parent entity level, but the parent entity must ensure sufficient funds are available for the branch's day-to-day operations.

**(3) The minimum net worth requirements mentioned above are separate and in addition to any minimum net worth requirements applicable to other activities within or outside the IFSC.**
The answer is not available in the provided context.
